1.0.name: wordpress/recent-custom-posts
1.0.description: This plugin provides a way to display the most recent posts from multiple custom post types in multiple widgetized areas. In function, it is much like the default Recent Posts widget, as it is a multi-widget for displaying recent posts, but it allows you to choose what post types to display.
